summary: Workflow::upsertTypedSearchAttributes causes test timeout when called inside a workflow. The user suspects search attributes may not be supported by the test server.
userImpact: Users cannot test workflows that use typed search attribute upserts, causing test failures and blocking development.
rootCause: Search attributes may not be supported by the test server, causing the upsert operation to hang indefinitely.
keyQuote: I'm not sure that search attributes are supported by the test server at all
